ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I m only level 20, so I don t have any experience with this, but could the MR debuff effect of the level 39 charm song explain how you finally got charm to
ygData.messageBody:
I'm only level 20, so I don't have any experience with this, but could the
MR debuff effect of the level 39 charm song explain how you finally got
charm to stick? Sounds like something to test anyway since you couldn't get
the charm to stick until the level 51 bard charmed the knight first.

Gilgurth
Bard of 20 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 1:11 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark songs and stuff


Ok, I pulled my log from last night and checked... I actually had 8
charm resists (long enough for our cleric to die) in a row before the
level 51 bard in our party charmed the Spectral Knight for the first
time. After her charm broke, she charmed it again and when that broke
I was able to take control of it and sit it by the castle as we moved
to zone. After that she charmed it 3 or 4 more times while people
made their way to zone and then I charmed it once as she made her way
out this time with no resist. Definately a con yellow at level 50
too, and the other bard said it conned white to her at level 51. I
got summoned by the Knight first and then the cleric second, probably
from healing me which was his death sentence.

The level 51 bard barely got resisted by the Knight where as I started
with 8 in a row (I almost never get resisted...). Don't know for sure
if the resists were level dependent or if it was because of the
infamous Verant semi-random number generator.

[part of message clipped]
